fields_of_interest: International co-operation and development, Energy, Environment, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, European Neighbourhood Policy
eu_initiatives:
Our significant world-class discoveries in the Eastern Mediterranean provide an exceptional opportunity to deliver energy security and economic development for Cyprus and the broader Eastern Mediterranean region. 
Main areas that EU initiatives, policies and legislative files that are of interest to Noble energy include but are not limited to: Energy Union, Energy Security, Gas Infrastructure Developments, European Neighborhood Policy, EU Air Policy, Offshore Oil and Gas safety, Environment
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations

goals__remit: At Noble Energy, we are driven by our purpose - Energizing the World, Bettering People's Lives®. We believe in safely and responsibly providing energy to the world through oil and natural gas exploration and production, while positively influencing the lives of our stakeholders. We strive to be the energy partner of choice, a responsible corporate citizen and the preferred employer of the industry's top talent.
position: Director, International Government Relations and Communications
